content: this is a matching hat and cowl pattern that is perfect for anyone choose your favorite chunky to bulky yarn and have fun materials hat uses 1 skein of malabrigo vientos cowl uses 2 skeins of malabrigo vientos samples shown in color amphibian vientos 130 yards per 100g skein 100% superwash wool hand wash dry flat needles 16 us # 9 and us# 10 us #10 32 for magic loop at the top of the hat stitch marker and tapestry needle two sizes are given for the hat pattern the cowl is one size fits all this is a free pattern to say thank you please purchase your yarn from the yarn club 1 in virginia beach va or your favorite lys 1 https //yarnclubknits com/collections/bulky/products/vientos
